aristotaliya sanwakyayehi nigamanawalata elambaenne ese no we.
eyath ekathara andamaka wisheshathwayak, mokada anek wimana nirmanaya karanna yodagena thiyenne 'rajalohaya' nisa.
agramathya ranil wikramasinha mema adahas pala kale ada (08) kolambaa, nelum pokuna rangahale pawathi jathika wishrama dina samarum uthsawayata pradhana aaradhithaya washayen sahabhagi wemini.

sanjiwa bandara yanu anthar wishwawidyaliya shishya bala mandalaye kadawumkaru ya.anawasara raswim sanwidhanaya kirima, mahajanaya apahasuwata pathwana se udghoshana sanwidhanaya kirima athulu chodana ella karamin ohu rimand bharayata path kara atha.ohuta kisindu wishwa widyalayakata athulu wima thahanam kara athi athara sathi thunakata warak iru dinayaka polisiyata gos thama jiwath wana bawath panagos nathi bawath sanatha kala yuthuya.kese wethath eki kriya marga hethu kotagena lankawe mini maraganim sighra lesa aduwanu atha.prajathanthrawadi rataka pradhana lakshanayak wana nithiya idiriye siyalloma eka samana wima lankawe kriyathmaka wana bawata hondama udaharanaya sanjiwa bandara ath adanguwata ganimaya.anthare wewa kumana ho shishya sangamayaka kandawum karuweku wu pamanin nithiya ohuta wisheshayak kirimata sudanam nathi bawa penwa demin ohuta panawu dandanaya samastha shri lankikayin dohoth mudun di anumatha kala yuthuya.
meya pariwruththiya sindrom wala pradhana lakshanayaki.insiyulin homonaya obe rudhirayen glukos obe saila thulata gena yayi.
ekaga wana oba samama....
rate samastha widuli uthpadanayen siyayata haththapahakata wadi pa්ramanayak sidukara thibune gal anguru saha indhana bhawithayen.
rajapakshalata kade giya madhya aayathana janathawa nomanga yawanawa – agamathi
samahara welawata senaga adu palu pradeshawalath inna wenawa.

jathika nidahas peramune nayaka, amathi wimalge asa da punchi sanduni kerehi yomuwa thibini.”dadi dushkaratha madhyaye thamayi jiwath wanne” ee ekthara rupawahini wadasatahanak narambaamin sitiyadi sandunige piya rupawahini nalikawata pawasana ayuru amathyawarayata dakagatha hakiwiya.”lankawe hama pawulakatama wasayata sudusu niwesak labadimata thamayi api janasewana jathika niwasa sanwardhana meheyuma aarambha kara aththe.

dala deshiya nishpadithayen (da. de. ni.) aduma tharamin 6% k adhyapanaya sandaha wen kirima sandaha wu yunesko sammuthiya thula awadharanaya karanu laba aththe ema aramuna itu kara ganima sandaha mulikawa rajaye prathipadana wen kirima sambandhawayi.

loka manushyaya padaname sabhapathi saha shri්ra lanka ramanynya nikaye nikayarakshaka garu bhandagarika deshashakthi aacharya marwin dhanawardhana guruge mahatha wisin rachitha ‘bauddha wiwahaya’ granthaye anthargathaya handunwadime madhya sakachchawak pasugiyada kolambaa jathika pusthakala shrawanagarayedi pawathwini.udammita gnyaneshwara himiyange mulasanathwayen saha agramathya madhya lekam nishantha alwis athulu wishesha amuththange sahabhagithwayen pawathi uthsawaye pradhana deshanaya kalaniya wishwawidyalaye sanskruthika adhyayana anshaye pitadhipathi mahacharya induragare dhammarathana na himiyan wisin sidu kala athara aacharya dhanawardhana guruge mahatha aramuna pahadili karana ladi.

sandahan wana aakarayata mema sudu jathika puhunukaruta shri lanka mudalin rupiyal laksha 30 kata aasanna mudalak gewim karanu labana bawath, eeta amatharawa adala puhunu sasiya sandaha adhika mila ganan sahitha kama bimada labadi thibena bawath sandahan wana athara eya anawashya mudal ka damimak bawa puhunukaruwange mathaya wi thibe.
dantha sanwedithawa hewath dath hiriwatimata niwaradi purwa prathikarmayan anugamanaya nokirima hethuwen idiriyedi mema thaththwaya thawath ugra wiya haka.
namuth uthuru indiyanu landun itham pahapathwa sundarawa inne me ira rashmiyen ena hani dayaka balapam walata wiruddhawa kasthuri kaha wala athi karkiyumin ithama thadin kriya karana nisayi.
mata, akkata, ammata thaththata bari wunath ayiyagen thaggak nolabi yanne na..

oyage pani berena wachanayi boru.
mage dakunu kakula thibune naha.

api dan ahana asuwa dashakaye nirmanaya wunu bohomayak githa kasat pata saha chitha්rapata githawala wadakayek hatiyata mata dayaka wenna hakiyawa labuna.

dawase paya 24 purawata sinhala, demala ha ingrisi bhashawangen kriyathmaka wana mema shri lanka lama durakathana sewaya wetha oonama jangama ho sthawara durakathanayakin nomile praweshawime hakiyawa atha.
me gana sachini apata kiwiwe me wage kathawak.
eha paththe hitapu eka mage badata anna katha kara ganna wachana enne nathi tharamata.
dedena eda nawathan ganne aluth game ambalamakaya.
bambuwa rathwana wita athule bhu®mithel da rath we.
me athara galagodaaththe gnyanasara himiyan ginthota thuparama wiharasthanayata wadama kara athi bawa aaranchi wu wajira ehi giye unwahanse samaga katha kirimataya.

kunukanda iwath kirima dawasin deken sidukala nohaki athara, ee sandaha yam kalayak gathawana bawada manthriwaraya kiya.udghoshanayaka niratha wima janathawage prajathanthrawadi ayithiyak wana athara, eyata paharadima thama tharaye heladakina bawath, kolonnawa nagara sabhawe kihipadenekuge madihathwima matha udghoshanakaruwanta paharadi athi bawath manthriwaraya prakasha kaleya.
sangithaya puduma aalokayak wuna.
nama witharayi wenas wenne behetha ekayi.
siye pettiye pipirum dekayi.
kappetipola aarthika madhyasthanayata pamina siti dayananda mahathma kiya sitiye ”mama gowijana sewa ekata ala dunne sapthambar nawa wanida.
mekath ara jathyantharawadi supiriwyuhaye buddhimathunge nirmanayak.
pala yamata uthsaha kirime di pradeshawasinge da sahaya athiwa sakakaru athadanguwata gath bawa polisiya sandahan kaleya.
ee wana wita, gamunu nam sinhala jathiwadi sangnyartha sahitha nama patabandagena siti demala jathikayaku wu kumar gunarathnam jawipe abhyantharaye athi prabala pudgalayaku wiya.
thraiyiloka gana katha wiwaranayan pana nagina wita nirayasayenma mathuwana mathayak we.
diyunu ha diyunu wemin pawathina ratawal bohomayak mema kramaya anuwa wruththiya nipunathawayan wargikaranaya kara ema kramaya bhawitha karamin pawathi.
awurudu 40 ka pamana kalayak thula sidu wu pradhana harthalayak lesa 1958 di sidu wu pama harthalaya hethuwen pradhana janawarga kandayam deka athare wishwasaya paludu wiya.
thama poya deka gewune nane.

witharak nowa eeye pawathi (19) nadu waraye thathwaya anuwa siyaluma warana niyogada awasan wi adala nirmana karuwanta sidukala apahasaya wenuwen unda yali naduwaka siragathawa aththeya.dan badukarayata erehiwa sinamakaruwa saha warana niyogayata muhuna pa sesu hathdenagen naduwak wati atha.
dan aththe elawalu ganime awasthawayi.

ema idamwala paramparikawa jiwath wu saha el.ti.ti.ee. wisin balahathkarayen ema idamwalin palawa harinu labima nisa awurudu wissak anatha kandawuruwala jiwath wu janathawak aapasu thama idakadamwalata paminima, 2012 di aanduwa gath aththanomathika sanrakshana thinduwakata muwawemin anumatha nokarana janadhipathiwaraya.
eyin mama dolar dahas gananak upaya gaththa.
athi amma samawa mattan nokala.
kiyana eka pahadiliwa thibuna.
oba swayan-aushadha laba gatha hakiya, samahara wita peralayit panayak laba ganimen, namuth obata obe roga lakshana kalamanakaranaya kirimata saha obe jiwithayen gatha haki we.
mama badu ganna aatha kadeta yanna amaru nisa laga kadekin adata witharak athiwenna genawa.
athage ek dalayak da, kisiyam pudgalayeku kapagena gos thibuna.
nawe thibune nithi wirodhi gini awi bawata chodanawak ella wi thibiya di ema gini awi thamange yanuwen ehi ayithiya wenuwen peni sitina pirisa eliyeya.
ema siduwimata sambandha pudgalayata danduwam labenne sthri dushanaya yana chodanawa yatatheya.
buwala mona monawado karala balala polime ena wun dekata bedala depaththata thallu karanawa.
sinamapataya ithama kuthuhalayen narambauwa.
mamath wesak niwaduwa uparimayen aragena adayi parana parata aayi aawe.....
man hithanne honda sinamawak, honda kalakruthiyak kiyanne rasikayata apurwa rasayak wagema ohu thama jiwithaya punarawalokanaya kirimata polambaawana yam arthanwitha bhawayakda sahitha deyakatayi.
eyata hethuwa maha mathiwaranayaka di thani pakshayakata balaya nolabima bawa sandahan kala yuthuya.
ratha wahana anathuru hethuwen amerikawe pamanak wasarakata 30,000kata wada wadi marana sankhyawak wartha wana athara, in siyayata 90k pamana siduwanne minisun athin siduwana waradi hethuweni.
inda thanak, jiwithe gatagahaganda widihak, thawa ahasa usata balaporoththu.
♦ swayan rakiya karmantha shalawak

jathika aarakshawa pilibanda madhya madhyasthanaya hiti hatiyema ahosi kara damimata rajaya gath piyawara ekthara andamaka aandolanathmaka siduwimak lesa salakiya haka.nagenahira saha wanni manushiya meheyum pawathi samaye janamadhya wetha thorathuru labadima saha el.ti. ti.ee. ya wisin gena giya hamuda wirodhi asathya pracharayan niwaradi kara nisi pilithuru sapayima wani sewayak salasu ema madhya madhyasthanaya yuddhaya awasan wu pasuwada wasara 4 1/2 k ...	12

eheyin sahithya-kala pilibanda podu wignyanaya, eya wata kota bandi kalpanika pawuru padanam pupuruwa hara pudgalika depala kramayen da shrama wibhajanayen da panthi aragalayen da sankshobhitha wu saba lokaya wetha galanayata man salasiya yuthu wiya; kalpana lokaya his guwan thalayen uguluwa waishayika lokayehi bhuthalaya matha yali idi kala yuthu wiya.

mema ayis thattu sandehi uthuru ha dakunu ardhayan dwithwayehima pawathina bawayi ema widyagnyayin pirisa wadiduratath pawasanne. 2008 – 2009 yana kalaya thuladi sanda gaweshanayehi niyalunu indiyawata ayath ‘chandrayan wan’ namathi abhyawakasha yanaya magin mema thorathuru helidaraw kara athayi wides warthawanhi sandahan.

tharuta wasanawantha nawa wasarak!!!

eya sada haritha wanagahanayen yuth ghana nillen didulannak wiya.

mathiwarana komasaris departhamenthuwa wisin uuwa palathe liyapadinchi chandadayakayanta bedadima sandaha thapal departhamenthuwata labadun nila chanda danwim pathrikawalin 95% kata wadi pramanayak thapal departhamenthuwa wisin nila washayen bedahara athayi da amathiwaraya kiweya.
masa dekakata withara passe thama post ekak liyanna.
mathakaye hatiyatanam thanin thanawu niwasa sankyawanam madak wadiwi thibenawa seya.
meka oyage hithata aapu sithuwillakda nathnam?”
eya nirathuru sakachchawak.
dan kattiyama mala walalu karabu pendant chokalat rosa mal ayi pod mobayil fon ehema aragena sudanam sharirayen aththe.
shri lanka rajayata wiruddhawa ella wana chodana gena wimarshanaya kirime wagakima shri lanka rajayata ma pawarima piligatha nohaki piliwethak lesinuyi, ohu wigraha karanne.
